Package org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class JsItemsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.JsItemsHelper
  • final class JsItemsHelper
extends Object
    This is a singleton wrapper for Java native object which is wrapping a CHARBA java script object implementation with some utilities to act on java script objects for CHARBA items.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static JsItemsHelper INSTANCE  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private JsItemsHelper()
      To avoid any instantiation

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) String format​(ScaleItem scale, long time, String format)
      Formats the time passed as argument with the passed format.
      (package private) static JsItemsHelper get()
      Singleton object to get the helper instance
      (package private) double getBasePixel​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns the pixel for the minimum chart value.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double getBaseValue​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns the minimum chart value.
      (package private) NativeObject getCenterPoint​(NativeObject element, boolean useFinalPosition)
      Returns the center point of the element.
      (package private) String getDataElementType​(NativeObject controller)
      Returns the data element type.
      (package private) NativeObject getDatasetControllerStyle​(NativeObject controller, int dataIndex)
      Returns a set of predefined style properties that should be used to represent the dataset or the data if the index is specified.
      (package private) String getDatasetElementType​(NativeObject controller)
      Returns the dataset element type.
      (package private) double getDecimalForPixel​(ScaleItem scale, double pixel)
      Used to get the data value from a given pixel.
      This is the inverse of getPixelForValue.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double getDistanceFromCenterForValue​(ScaleItem scale, double value)
      Returns the distance from the center of a specific value.
      (package private) String getLabelForValue​(ScaleItem scale, double value)
      Used to get the label to display in the tooltip for the given value.
      (package private) ArrayObject getLabelItems​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns the labels computed in the scale.
      (package private) double getPixelForDecimal​(ScaleItem scale, double decimal)
      Utility for getting the pixel location of a percentage of scale.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double getPixelForStringValue​(ScaleItem scale, String value, double index)
      Returns the location of the given data point as string.
      (package private) double getPixelForTick​(ScaleItem scale, double index)
      Returns the location of the tick at the given index.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double getPixelForValue​(ScaleItem scale, double value, double index)
      Returns the location of the given data point.
      Value can either be an index or a numerical value.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) NativeObject getProps​(NativeObject element, ArrayString properties, boolean useFinalPosition)
      Returns the list of properties of the element.

      Returns the value calculated applying the specific distance from the center.

      Returns if the point passed as the argument is in the element.

      Returns if the point X passed as the argument is in the element.

      Returns if the point Y passed as the argument is in the element.

      Returns true if the property in the native object is a CanvasGradientItem.

      Returns true if the property in the native object is a CanvasPatternItem.
      (package private) boolean isHorizontal​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns true if the scale is horizontal.

      • getDecimalForPixel

        double getDecimalForPixel​(ScaleItem scale,
                          double pixel)
        Used to get the data value from a given pixel.
        This is the inverse of getPixelForValue.
        The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        scale - scale native object instance
        pixel - pixel value
        Returns:
        the data value from a given pixel

        The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        scale - scale native object instance
        decimal - number value to use
        Returns:
        the pixel location of a percentage of scale

      • getPixelForValue

        double getPixelForValue​(ScaleItem scale,
                        double value,
                        double index)
        Returns the location of the given data point.
        Value can either be an index or a numerical value.
        The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        scale - scale native object instance
        value - value of the data
        index - index of the data
        Returns:
        the location of the given data point

      • getValueForPixel

        double getValueForPixel​(ScaleItem scale,
                        double pixel)
        Used to get the data value from a given pixel.
        This is the inverse of getPixelForValue.
        The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        scale - scale native object instance
        pixel - pixel value
        Returns:
        the data value from a given pixel

      • getProps

        NativeObject getProps​(NativeObject element,
                      ArrayString properties,
                      boolean useFinalPosition)
        Returns the list of properties of the element.
        Parameters:
        element - element which should be invoked
        properties - list of properties to get
        useFinalPosition - if the position must be calculated with final dimensions or also during the animation.
        Returns:
        a native object with the selected properties

      • getCenterPoint

        NativeObject getCenterPoint​(NativeObject element,
                            boolean useFinalPosition)
        Returns the center point of the element.
        Parameters:
        element - element which should provide the point
        useFinalPosition - if the position must be calculated with final dimensions or also during the animation.
        Returns:
        the center point of the element.

      • inRange

        boolean inRange​(NativeObject element,
                double x,
                double y,
                boolean useFinalPosition)
        Returns if the point passed as the argument is in the element.
        Parameters:
        element - chart element instance
        x - point X value
        y - point Y value
        useFinalPosition - if the position must be calculated with final dimensions or also during the animation.
        Returns:
        true if the point is in the element

        Parameters:

        x - point X value
        useFinalPosition - if the position must be calculated with final dimensions or also during the animation.
        Returns:
